item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Cinta adalah kekuatan yang tak akan pernah ditundukkan. Kalau kita berusaha mengendalikannya, cinta akan menghancurkan kita. Kalau kita berusaha mengurungnya, cinta akan memperbudak kita. Kalau kita mencoba memahaminya, cinta akan meninggalkan kita dalam kebingungan." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation. It's one thing to feel that you are on the right path, but it's another to think that yours is the only path." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Penderitaan yang sesungguhnya adalah ketika kamu kehilangan kepercayaan diri dan harapan. Ketika Allah tak ada dalam tujuan hidupmu " -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Jika kita berupaya sekuat tenaga menemukan sesuatu, dan pada titik akhir upaya itu hasilnya masih nihil, maka sebenarnya kita telah menemukan yang kita cari dalam diri kita sendiri, yakni kenyataan, kenyataan yang harus dihadapi sepahit apapun keadaanya." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "...berbuat yang terbaik pada titik di mana aku berdiri, itulah sesungguhnya sikap yang realistis." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "ada saat-saat dalam hidup di mana kau harus mengambil resiko, untuk melakukan hal-hal yang gila" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "kebahagiaan adalah sesuatu yang berlipat ganda ketika dibagi" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Dan alangkah indah kehidupan tanpa merangkak-rangkak di hadapan orang lain" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kau akan berhasil dalam setiap pelajaran, dan kau harus percaya akan berhasil, dan berhasillah kau; anggap semua pelajaran mudah, dan semua akan jadi mudah; jangan takut pada pelajaran apa pun, karena ketakutan itu sendiri kebodohan awal yang akan membodohkan semua" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be." -- May Sarton

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "The animal merely makes a bed, which he warms with his body in a sheltered place; but man, having discovered fire, boxes up some air in a spacious apartment, and warms that, instead of robbing himself, makes that his bed, in which he can move about divested of more cumbrous clothing, maintain a kind of summer in the midst of winter, and by means of windows even admit the light and with a lamp lengthen out the day." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Alfred Hitchcock
item.description: "Ideas come from everything" -- Alfred Hitchcock

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Jean Webster
item.description: "Saya memang suka pada topi-topi serta benda-benda yang cantik, tapi saya tidak boleh menggadaikan masa depan saya untuk membeli barang-barang seperti itu." -- Jean Webster

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Jean Webster
item.description: "Kualitas paling penting yang perlu dimiliki oleh seseorang adalah imajinasi. Imajinasi membuat orang mampu menempatkan diri mereka di tempat orang lain. Imajinasi membuat mereka menjadi orang yang baik dan bisa bersimpati serta penuh pengertian." -- Jean Webster

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Jean Webster
item.description: "Yang terpenting bukanlah kenikmatan-kenikmatan berskala besar, melainkan bagaimana kita mampu mengeksploitasi yang kecil-kecil secara maksimal." -- Jean Webster

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Jean Webster
item.description: "Seseorang tidak akan merindukan apa yang tidak dia miliki, tapi sungguh sulit rasanya hidup tanpa benda-benda tertentu setelah dia terbiasa memilikinya." -- Jean Webster

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform a million realities." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "The caged bird sings with a fearful trill, of things unknown, but longed for still, and his tune is heard on the distant hill, for the caged bird sings of freedom." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "A friend may be waiting behind a stranger's face." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Emilie Autumn
item.description: "I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much." -- Emilie Autumn

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that I still have a lot to learn." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Pipitta add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You can't avoid pain, but you can choose to overcome it." -- Paulo Coelho
